module, draughting, drawing, drawing sheet
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to define a hierarchical organization of drawings, drawing sheets, and drawing views, together with the administrative information necessary to manage drawings and drawing sheets.
the structures for representing individual drawing revisions;
the hierarchical structure of drawings, drawing sheets; the administrative data used for the purpose of drawing management; and
the administrative data used for the purpose of drawing management.
the exchange of drawing history; Drawing history refers to prior drawing revisions.
the exchange of printer or plotter data used exclusively for the creation of paper or hard copy versions of the drawing; Printer or plotter data can be pen designations, plot scale, or plot color specifications.
The Drawing_structure_and_administration UoF defines a particular revision of a drawing sheet, along with:
approval, security, contract and other administrative information; and
the structure of a drawing containing many drawing sheets.
